Structs/APIRequest/Error.html#/s:13qBiqC.name: status
Structs/APIRequest/Error.html#/s:13qBiqC.abstract: The HTTP status code for the error response.

Structs/APIResponse.html#/s:13qBiqClient.name: GetFunc
Structs/APIResponse.html#/s:13qBiqClient.abstract: Type of function returning response value or throwing the error.

Structs/APIRequest.html.name: APIRequest
Structs/APIRequest.html.abstract: Namespace around lower level API request activities.

Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.name: listGroups(user:callback:)
Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.abstract: List the groups belonging to the user.

Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.name: listDevices(user:groupId:callback:)
Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.abstract: List the devices in the indicated group.

Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.name: createGroup(user:groupName:callback:)
Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.abstract: Create a group with the given name.

Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.name: addGroupDevice(user:groupId:deviceId:callback:)
Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.abstract: Add the device to the indicated group.

Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.name: removeGroupDevice(user:groupId:deviceId:callback:)
Extensions/GroupAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCodab.abstract: Remove the indicated device from the group.

Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.name: listDevices(user:callback:)
Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.abstract: List all devices the user has access to.

Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.name: shareDevice(user:deviceId:shareToken:callback:)
Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.abstract: Attempt to share the device to the current user.

Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.name: getShareDeviceToken(user:deviceId:callback:)
Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.abstract: Create a share token which can be given to another user permitting them to

Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.name: deviceObservations(user:deviceId:interval:callback:)
Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.abstract: Retrieve device observations of the indicated interval.

Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.name: setDeviceFlags(user:deviceId:newFlags:callback:)
Extensions/DeviceAPI.html#/s:13SwiftCoda.abstract: Set the flags for the indicated device.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: deviceId
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: The id for the users mobile device.

Classes/Authentication/Error.html.name: Error
Classes/Authentication/Error.html.abstract: Error object thrown for some auth related problems.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: token
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: The token returned by the auth server after successful authentication.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: user
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: The authenticated user. If this is nil then the user is not authenticated.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: checkLoggedIn(callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Checks if the user is logged in and that the current token is valid.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: getMe(callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Retrieves up to date information for the current user.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: login(email:password:callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Attempt to log in with the given address and password.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: completeRecoverPassword(address:password:token:callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Complete a device local password recovery operation.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: getMeta(callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Get the meta-data attached to the account.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: addDeviceId(_:callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Send the device id to the server.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: loginOAuthGoogle(handlerMaker:callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Attempt to log in through Google OAuth.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: loginOAuthFacebook(handlerMaker:callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Attempt to log in through Facebook OAuth.

Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.name: loginOAuthLinkedin(handlerMaker:callback:)
Classes/Authentication.html#/s:13qBiqCli.abstract: Attempt to log in through Linkedin OAuth.

Classes/Authentication.html.name: Authentication
Classes/Authentication.html.abstract: Current state of user authentication for the app.
